alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Howard (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:47AM CDT until June 15 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT FOR EASTERN HOWARD AND NORTHEASTERN CHICKASAW COUNTIES... At 1045 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lime Springs to near Jerico, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. Nickel sized hail was reported near Alta Vista at about 1040 am. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Cresco around 1055 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Vernon Springs County Park, Schley, Davis Corners, Vernon Springs, Bonair, Saude. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
